brick.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a hard block of baked clay used for building walls, houses etc
brick.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Protesters attacked the police with stones and bricks.
brick.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a small square block of wood, plastic etc used as a toy
brick.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a good person who you can depend on when you are in trouble
